text: The Communist Party of Hawaii was the party of the Communist Party USA in the Territory of Hawaii. It was founded in 1934 by Bill Bailey. The party was meant for many poor working class members, such as stevedores and plantation workers. The Communist Party helped form many labor unions and helped make labor strikes. They also made general strikes in the nonviolent revolution.In 1958, the party was dissolved. ==References== Category:Communist parties Category:Political parties in the United States Category:1958 disestablishments Category:Disestablishments in Oceania Category:1950s disestablishments in the United States Category:Socialism Category:1934 establishments in Oceania
title: Communist Party of Hawaii
